org.apache.twill.zookeeper

Class ZKClientService.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClientService.Builder
  • Enclosing interface:
    ZKClientService

    public static final class ZKClientService.Builder
extends Object
    Builder for creating an implementation of ZKClientService. The default client timeout is 10000ms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ZKClientService.Builder addAuthInfo(String schema, byte[] auth)
      Adds an authorization information.
      ZKClientService build()
      Creates an instance of ZKClientService with the settings of this builder.
      static ZKClientService.Builder of(String connectStr)
      Creates a ZKClientService.Builder with the given ZooKeeper connection string.
      ZKClientService.Builder setConnectionWatcher(org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher watcher)
      Sets a Watcher that will be called whenever connection state change.
      ZKClientService.Builder setSessionTimeout(int timeout)
      Sets the client timeout to the give milliseconds.
